name: Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking Experimental (01-21)
description: Updated experimental 2.0 Flash variant (January 21, 2025) with extended thinking capabilities. Shows step-by-step reasoning process for stronger reasoning on complex problems.
notes: EXPERIMENTAL - Free via Google AI Studio and Vertex AI. Updated January 21, 2025. 1M token context (increased from 32k in initial release). 64k max output tokens. Scored 73.3% on AIME 2024 and 74.2% on GPQA Diamond. Native code execution support. Generates explicit thinking process before responding. Available in Gemini app.
